title: Moti Haaram with Emerald Accents: A Statement of Timeless Elegance
materials: Crafted in 22K Gold with a Hyderabadi Polish

features: This stunning haaram showcases a cascading design inspired by traditional South Indian motifs. Each layer is meticulously crafted with delicate diamond-studded patterns interspersed with peacock motifs, symbolizing beauty and prosperity (Subham). The central emeralds are set in a bezel setting, adding a touch of regal charm. The overall design evokes the opulence of Hyderabadi Nizami jewelry.

and vibrant green emeralds. This classic combination is highly revered in South Indian culture.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Muhurtham)

adding a touch of heritage to a modern ensemble.
description: This haaram is more than just jewelry; it's an investment in a timeless heirloom. The exquisite craftsmanship, high-quality diamonds and emeralds, and the culturally significant design make it a truly special piece. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting luster, making it a treasure to be passed down through generations. The peacock motifs add a layer of symbolism, representing beauty, grace, and prosperity.
